review: I love it. I have the Fire TV box in the living room and the Fire TV stick in the bedroom. No big difference between their functionality. I love how well it works for Prime and Netflix.

review: I recieved the fire stick for Christmas. I already was a prime member and the fire stick made watching my favorite shows wonderful. It was so easy to use. It came with everything I needed. Just plug it in and follow the prompts and your done. I just added Netflix so I have even more stuff to watch. I can also take it with me where ever I go. I would recommend the fire stick. I just love it.
